720413f-a.title: Manhattan: Hester Street - Ludlow Street
720413f-a.text:
(1)
Hester Street, at, adjoining and east of the S.E. corner of Ludlow
Street. Also shown is Ludlow Street, at, adjoining and south of the
S.E. corner of Hester Street. Nos. 52-46 Hester Street, at, adjoining
and east of the S.E. corner of Ludlow Street, are 3-story frame buildings.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 547.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, from a different angle.
May 14, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
S)E 3)  N 2g. ~ 1N
720413f-a.folder: Hester Street & Ludlow Street, Manhattan, NY

732426f-a.title: Occupations - Peddlers - Food - Fruit.
732426f-a.text:
Dealer in foodstuffs and fruit, corner of Hester and Ludlow Streets.
-April 25, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
732426f-a.folder: Hester Street and Ludlow Street, Manhattan, N.Y.

721139f-a.title: Manhattan: Ludlow Street - Hester Street
721139f-a.text:
Ludlow Street, east side, north from (No. 38), but not including Hester Street.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPPODUCTIONS.
721139f-a.folder: Ludlow Street & Hester Street, Manhattan, NY

721140f-a.title: Manhattan: Ludlow Street - Hester Street
721140f-a.text:
Ludlow Street, at the N.E. corner of Hester Street. The peddler shown,
in the foreground, is characteristic of this neighborhood.
May 14, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
